snippet.title: VRShogiMates Trailer: Bringing Classic Board Games to Virtual Reality
snippet.description:
Hello everyone!

I'm thrilled to announce the launch of VRShogiMates, now available on both Steam and the Meta Quest App Lab! This project has been a labor of love, combining my passion for chess variants and virtual reality to bring you an unparalleled gaming experience.

What is VRShogiMates?

VRShogiMates is an immersive VR application that offers a diverse collection of classic board games, including:

Shogi & Chu Shogi: Dive into traditional Japanese strategy games.
Chess & Xiangqi: Challenge yourself with these timeless classics.
Gungi: Experience the unique game inspired by Hunter x Hunter, brought to VR for the first time!
Key Features:

Multiplayer Mode: Engage in real-time or turn-based matches with players worldwide, perfect for longer games like Chu Shogi and Gungi.
Learner Mode: Ideal for beginners and seasoned players looking to sharpen their skills with comprehensive tutorials and guides.
Regular Updates: I'm committed to continuous improvement, adding new features and enhancements based on your valuable feedback.
Download VRShogiMates:

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2915300/VRShogiMates/
Meta Quest App Lab: https://www.meta.com/experiences/5395133457243061/
Stay Connected:

Website: https://vrshogimates.wixsite.com/home/
Discord: Join our community for updates, discussions, and more: https://discord.gg/Hn9PWkHVwk
Twitter: Follow for the latest news and updates: https://x.com/DavisSir144614
Thank you for your support! I can't wait to hear your thoughts and see you in the game.

About the Developer:

I'm a solo hobby developer with a deep love for chess variations and virtual reality. VRShogiMates has been my passion project for a long time, and I'm excited to share it with you. Your feedback and support mean the world to me.

Tags: #VRShogiMates #VirtualReality #Shogi #Chess #Xiangqi #Gungi #BoardGames #GamingCommunity
